title: Transformers: Scramble City
synopsis: Beginning with a recap of the coming of the Transformers to Earth and the story of Devastator, the OVA then gets its original story underway, as the Autobots are shown to be in the midst of constructing the powerful "Scramble City," overseen by their newest arrival, Ultra Magnus.
staff: [['Shimonari, Satoko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Kawamori, Shouji', ['Mechanical Design']], ['Hayama, Junichi', ['Key Animation']], ['Sugiura, Shouichirou', ['Art Director']]]
